languages.text: "Только в ваших силах остановить это безумие! Мы же постепенно восстанавливаем астропатический хор Даргонуса. К счастью, нам пришлось умертвить лишь часть взбесившихся псайкеров, однако оставшиеся в живых астропаты пока не в силах отправлять послания. Надеюсь, господин Скаландр исполнит свое обещание и окажет вам поддержку в войне с ксеносами. Согласно его сообщениям, в последние циклы особенное беспокойство вызывает регион Веабос-6... еще одна причина узнать судьбу колонии как можно быстрее".

traits.locale_text: "Только в ваших силах остановить это безумие! Мы же постепенно восстанавливаем астропатический хор Даргонуса. К величайшему сожалению, нам пришлось умертвить часть взбесившихся псайкеров, в связи с чем астропатическая коммуникация для нас пока недоступна. Надеюсь, господин Скаландр исполнит свое обещание и окажет вам поддержку в войне с ксеносами. Согласно его сообщениям, в последние циклы особенное беспокойство вызывает регион Веабос-6... еще одна причина узнать судьбу колонии как можно быстрее".

languages.text: "Only you have the power to stop this madness! We are in the process of restoring the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Luckily, we were forced to slay only some of the deranged psykers, although those that remain are as yet unable to transmit messages. I hope Master Scalander will keep his word and offer you his support in the war against the xenos. According to his reports, the region of Vheabos VI has been of particular concern in the last few cycles... which is all the more reason to discover the colony's fate as soon as possible."
languages.original_text: "Только в ваших силах остановить это безумие! Мы же постепенно восстанавливаем астропатический хор Даргонуса. К счастью, нам пришлось умертвить лишь часть взбесившихся псайкеров, однако пересылать сообщения они пока не в силах. Надеюсь, господин Скаландр исполнит свое обещание и окажет вам поддержку в войне с ксеносами. Согласно его сообщениям, в последние циклы особенное беспокойство вызывает регион Веабос-6... еще одна причина узнать судьбу колонии как можно быстрее".

traits.locale_text: "Only you have the power to stop this madness! We are in the process of restoring the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus — hopefully Master Scalander will keep his word and offer you his support in the war against xenos. According to his latest reports, the region of Vheabos VI has been of particular concern in the last few cycles... which is all the more reason to discover the colony's fate as soon as possible."

"Only you have the power to stop this madness! We are in the process of restoring the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus — hopefully Master Scalander will keep his word and offer you his support in the war against xenos. According to his latest reports, the region of Vheabos VI has been of particular concern in the last few cycles... which is all the more reason to discover the colony's fate as soon as possible."

"Only you have the power to stop this madness! We are in the process of restoring the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Luckily, we were forced to slay only some of the derange psykers, although those that remain are as yet unable to transmit messages. I hope Master Scalander will keep his word and offer you his support in the war against the xenos. According to his reports, the region of Vheabos-VI has been of particular concern in the last few cycles... which is all the more reason to discover the colony's fate as soon as possible."

"Only you have the power to stop this madness! We are in the process of restoring the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Luckily, we were forced to slay only some of the derange psykers, although those that remain are as yet unable to transmit messages. I hope Master Scalander will keep his word and offer you his support in the war against the xenos. According to his reports, the region of Vheabos-VI has been of particular concern in the last few cycles... which is all the more reason to discover the colony's fate as soon as possible."

"Only you have the power to stop this madness! We are in the process of restoring the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Luckily, we were forced to slay only some of the deranged psykers, although those that remain are as yet unable to transmit messages. I hope Master Scalander will keep his word and offer you his support in the war against the xenos. According to his reports, the region of Vheabos VI has been of particular concern in the last few cycles... which is all the more reason to discover the colony's fate as soon as possible."

languages.text: “只要您才有力量阻止这样的疯狂！我们目前正在努力恢复达戈努斯的星语唱诗班。好消息是，我们仅仅被迫杀死了一部分发了疯的灵能者，但剩下的灵能者至今为止依然无法传递任何信息。我希望斯卡兰德大师能遵守他的诺言，在对抗异形的战争中支持您。根据他的报告，在过去的几个周期里，维博斯六号星的情况尤为令人担忧……因此，我们更有理由尽快将那个殖民地从危难中拯救出来。”
languages.original_text: "Only you have the power to stop this madness! We are in the process of restoring the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Luckily, we were forced to slay only some of the deranged psykers, although those that remain are as yet unable to transmit messages. I hope Master Scalander will keep his word and offer you his support in the war against the xenos. According to his reports, the region of Vheabos VI has been of particular concern in the last few cycles... which is all the more reason to discover the colony's fate as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: “只要您才有力量阻止这样的疯狂！我们目前正在努力恢复达戈努斯的星语唱诗班。好消息是，我们仅仅被迫杀死了一部分发了疯的灵能者，但剩下的灵能者至今为止依然无法传递任何信息。我希望斯卡兰德大师能遵守他的诺言，在对抗异形的战争中支持您。根据他的报告，在过去的几个周期里，维博斯六号星的情况尤为令人担忧……因此，我们更有理由尽快将那个殖民地从危难中拯救出来。”

languages.text: «¡Solo usted puede detener esta locura! Estamos restaurando el Coro de Astrópatas de Dargonis. Por suerte, solo tuvimos que eliminar a unos pocos psíquicos desquiciados, pero los que quedan aún no pueden enviar mensajes. Espero que el maestro Scalander cumpla su palabra y le ofrezca su apoyo en la guerra contra los xenos. Según sus informes, la región de Vheabos VI ha sido especialmente preocupante en los últimos ciclos... por lo que descubrir qué ha sido de la colonia es más urgente que nunca».
languages.original_text: "Only you have the power to stop this madness! We are in the process of restoring the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Luckily, we were forced to slay only some of the deranged psykers, although those that remain are as yet unable to transmit messages. I hope Master Scalander will keep his word and offer you his support in the war against the xenos. According to his reports, the region of Vheabos VI has been of particular concern in the last few cycles... which is all the more reason to discover the colony's fate as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: «¡Solo usted puede detener esta locura! Estamos restaurando el Coro de Astrópatas de Dargonis. Por suerte, solo tuvimos que eliminar a unos pocos psíquicos desquiciados, pero los que quedan aún no pueden enviar mensajes. Espero que el maestro Scalander cumpla su palabra y le ofrezca su apoyo en la guerra contra los xenos. Según sus informes, la región de Vheabos-VI ha sido especialmente preocupante en los últimos ciclos... por lo que descubrir qué ha sido de la colonia es más urgente que nunca».

languages.text: 「この狂気の沙汰に歯止めをかけられるのはあなたしかおりません！我々はダルゴナスの感応通信聖歌隊を復活させる過程にあります。幸いにも、狂った異能者のごく一部のみを始末するのにとどめることができましたが、残っているものはいまだにメッセージを伝えることができません。マスター・スカランダーが約束を守り、異種族との戦いにおいて支援を申し出てくれることを願っています。彼の報告によると、ここ数周回の間でヴィアボス・VIの地域が特に懸念されているようです…だからこそ、一刻も早くコロニーの運命を知る必要があります」
languages.original_text: "Only you have the power to stop this madness! We are in the process of restoring the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Luckily, we were forced to slay only some of the deranged psykers, although those that remain are as yet unable to transmit messages. I hope Master Scalander will keep his word and offer you his support in the war against the xenos. According to his reports, the region of Vheabos VI has been of particular concern in the last few cycles... which is all the more reason to discover the colony's fate as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: 「この狂気の沙汰に歯止めをかけられるのはあなたしかおりません！我々はダルゴヌスの感応通信聖歌隊を復活させる過程にあります。幸いにも、狂った異能者のごく一部のみを始末するのにとどめることができましたが、残っているものはいまだにメッセージを伝えることができません。マスター・スカランダーが約束を守り、異種族との戦いにおいて支援を申し出てくれることを願っています。彼の報告によると、ここ数周回の間でヴェアボスVIの地域が特に懸念されているようです…だからこそ、一刻も早くコロニーの運命を知る必要があります」

languages.text: "Nur Ihr habt die Macht, diesen Wahnsinn zu stoppen! Wir sind gerade dabei, den astropathischen Chor von Dargonus wiederherzustellen. Zum Glück mussten wir nur wenige der wahnsinnigen Psioniker töten, aber die verbliebenen sind noch nicht wieder in der Lage, Nachrichten zu übermitteln. Ich hoffe, Meister Scalander wird sein Wort halten und Euch im Krieg gegen die Xenos seine Unterstützung anbieten. Seinen Berichten zufolge hat dabei die Region um Vheabos VI in den letzten Zyklen die größten Sorgen bereitet ... ein Grund mehr, dem Schicksal der Kolonie so schnell wie möglich auf den Grund zu gehen."
languages.original_text: "Only you have the power to stop this madness! We are in the process of restoring the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Luckily, we were forced to slay only some of the deranged psykers, although those that remain are as yet unable to transmit messages. I hope Master Scalander will keep his word and offer you his support in the war against the xenos. According to his reports, the region of Vheabos VI has been of particular concern in the last few cycles... which is all the more reason to discover the colony's fate as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Nur Ihr habt die Macht, diesen Wahnsinn zu stoppen! Wir sind gerade dabei, den astropathischen Chor von Dargonus wiederherzustellen. Zum Glück mussten wir nur wenige der wahnsinnigen Psioniker töten, aber die verbliebenen sind noch nicht wieder in der Lage, Nachrichten zu übermitteln. Ich hoffe, Meister Scalander wird sein Wort halten und Euch im Krieg gegen die Xenos seine Unterstützung anbieten. Seinen Berichten zufolge hat dabei die Region um Vheabos-VI in den letzten Zyklen die größten Sorgen bereitet ... ein Grund mehr, dem Schicksal der Kolonie so schnell wie möglich auf den Grund zu gehen."

languages.text: « Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez mettre un terme à cette folie ! Nous sommes sur le point de restaurer le chœur astropathique de Dargonus. Par chance, seule une minorité des psykers a dû être éliminée, cela même si les survivants ne sont pas encore capables de transmettre des messages. J'espère sincèrement que maître Scalander tiendra parole et vous aidera dans cette guerre contre les xénos. D'après ses rapports, la région de Vhéabos-VI est un grand sujet d'inquiétude ces derniers cycles... Il est donc d'autant plus crucial de découvrir ce qu'il est advenu de cette colonie. »
languages.original_text: "Only you have the power to stop this madness! We are in the process of restoring the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Luckily, we were forced to slay only some of the deranged psykers, although those that remain are as yet unable to transmit messages. I hope Master Scalander will keep his word and offer you his support in the war against the xenos. According to his reports, the region of Vheabos VI has been of particular concern in the last few cycles... which is all the more reason to discover the colony's fate as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: « Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez mettre un terme à cette folie ! Nous sommes sur le point de restaurer le chœur astropathique de Dargonus. Par chance, seule une minorité des psykers a dû être éliminée, cela même si les survivants ne sont pas encore capables de transmettre des messages. J'espère sincèrement que maître Scalander tiendra parole et vous aidera dans cette guerre contre les xénos. D'après ses rapports, la région de Vhéabos-VI est un grand sujet d'inquiétude ces derniers cycles... Il est donc d'autant plus crucial de découvrir ce qu'il est advenu de cette colonie. »

languages.text: "Bu deliliği durdurma gücüne yalnızca siz sahipsiniz! Biz Dargonus'un Astropatik Koro'sunu yeniden inşa etme sürecindeyiz. Neyse ki delirmiş ruhsezerlerin yalnızca bir kısmını öldürmek zorunda kaldık, kalanlarsa henüz mesaj iletebilecek durumda değil. Umarım Üstat Scalander sözünde durup zenolara karşı savaşınızda sizi destekler. Verdiği raporlara bakılırsa Vheabos VI bölgesi, son birkaç döngüdür ciddi bir endişe kaynağıymış. Koloninin akıbetini bir an önce öğrenmek bu yüzden daha da önem kazandı."
languages.original_text: "Only you have the power to stop this madness! We are in the process of restoring the Astropathic Choir of Dargonus. Luckily, we were forced to slay only some of the deranged psykers, although those that remain are as yet unable to transmit messages. I hope Master Scalander will keep his word and offer you his support in the war against the xenos. According to his reports, the region of Vheabos VI has been of particular concern in the last few cycles... which is all the more reason to discover the colony's fate as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Bu deliliği durdurma gücüne yalnızca siz sahipsiniz! Biz Dargonus'un Astropatik Koro'sunu yeniden inşa etme sürecinin içindeyiz. Neyse ki delirmiş ruhsezerlerin yalnızca bir kısmını öldürmek zorunda kaldık ancak kalanlar henüz mesaj iletebilir durumda değil. Umarım Üstat Scalander sözünde durur ve zenolara karşı olan savaşınızda sizi destekler. Verdiği raporlara bakılırsa Vheabos VI bölgesi son birkaç döngüdür ciddi bir endişe kaynağı hâline gelmiş. Koloninin akıbetini bir an önce öğrenmek bu yüzden daha da önemli."
